metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20961 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel before 4.16.4, a double free vulnerability in thef_midi_set_alt function of drivers/usb/gadget/function/f_midi.c in thef_midi driver may allow attackers to cause a denial of service or possiblyhave unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
